about_the_game:
This DLC contains over 225 wallpapers of all girls presented in PumPum 2 and its DLCs, each one has 9 versions [SFW, Lingerie, Nude] x [Closeup, Full growth, 8K resolution].

Ultra high quality, crisp artworks.
The native resolution of ALL artworks is 4K or greater.
Wallpapers come in 6000 x 4000, JPG with 100% quality.
Also available in 8K resolution (12000x8000 pixels).

This DLC contains static JPG images only!
You can find them in the "wallpapers" directory next to the main game executable ( C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\PumPum 2\wallpapers by default )

content_descriptors.notes: Might be not safe for work. Contains Sexual Content & Nudity.

detailed_description:
This DLC contains over 225 wallpapers of all girls presented in PumPum 2 and its DLCs, each one has 9 versions [SFW, Lingerie, Nude] x [Closeup, Full growth, 8K resolution].

Ultra high quality, crisp artworks.
The native resolution of ALL artworks is 4K or greater.
Wallpapers come in 6000 x 4000, JPG with 100% quality.
Also available in 8K resolution (12000x8000 pixels).

This DLC contains static JPG images only!
You can find them in the "wallpapers" directory next to the main game executable ( C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\PumPum 2\wallpapers by default )
legal_notice:
Original artworks by 양만식 "Yam Spectrum".

This game is a work of fiction. All characters or associations are a product of author's imagination; names, characters, places and incidents either are products of the author’s imagination or are used fictitiously. Any resemblance to other products or people (living or dead) or places is entirely coincidental.

Every appearing character is over 18 years old.

Special thanks to Ágost "The Dreadist" Veres for translation to Hungarian!

short_description: This DLC contains over 225 wallpapers of all girls presented in PumPum 2 and its DLCs, each one has 12 versions [SFW, Lingerie, Nude] x [Closeup, Full growth, 8K resolution]. The native resolution of ALL artworks is 4K or greater, 6000 x 4000 pixels.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Vietnamese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Japanese*, Hindi*, Czech*, Hungarian*
